entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
